site.title: Tolevats' Portfolio
site.description: The professional portfolio of Pascale Stavelot, a passionate web developer.

hero.headline: Full-Stack Enthusiast: Bridging Creativity & Code
hero.greeting: Hi, I’m Pascale Stavelot, a bilingual web developer based in Chile, on a mission to code a better world! Welcome to My Professional Portfolio—transforming ideas into impactful digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: From ad campaigns to code: crafting stories, building solutions
about.paragraph1: Once, my canvas was compelling ad copy; now, it's the intricate world of web development. My journey is a testament to the power of curiosity, a relentless desire to learn and grow. My professional story began in advertising, where as a copywriter, I learned to captivate audiences and distill complex ideas into clear, engaging messages. Little did I know, this foundation in storytelling was preparing me for a different kind of creation.
about.paragraph2: The pivotal shift began with the Google UX Design Professional Certificate. This immersive experience sparked a passion for user-centered design and a desire to create digital experiences that were not only visually appealing but also intuitive and impactful. It was here that I started to bridge the gap between creative expression and functional problem-solving.
about.paragraph3: The final catalyst was my acceptance into the Laboratoria Web Development bootcamp. This intensive program wasn't just about learning to code; it was about embracing a new way of thinking, collaborating, and innovating. There, I faced a significant challenge: transitioning from conceptual design to the rigorous logic of backend development. I remember grappling with a particularly complex API integration, feeling overwhelmed by the sheer volume of new information. Instead of giving up, I broke the problem down into smaller, manageable pieces, spending extra hours in front of the screen, collaborating with peers, and tirelessly debugging until the solution clicked. This experience solidified my belief in the power of persistence and problem-solving.
about.paragraph4: Today, I’m an entry-level developer eager to apply my diverse skill set to create innovative and user-friendly web solutions. I'm driven by a desire to build applications that not only solve real-world problems but also leave a lasting positive impression. If you're curious to see how my journey unfolds and what I'm working on, I invite you to click on "View Mission: Possible" and connect with me on LinkedIn for insights into my latest achievements and learnings. Let's explore the possibilities together!

achievements.title: Missions: Possible > ./impact
achievements.description: Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to dive into my "Dev Missions". This space is a testament to challenges embraced and solutions delivered through my participation in hackathons and committed voluntary efforts. Every project here is a successful operation that redirects challenges into tangible, positive impact.

hackathons.name: HackAmine 2024
hackathons.role: Web Developer, contributed to user interface design and implemented agile methodologies to optimize teamwork.
hackathons.impact: Developed key UI components for a platform designed to tackle modern mining industry challenges,

hackathons.name: Hackatón Código Club 2025 - Codecademy
hackathons.role: Frontend Developer, focused on intuitive UI/UX and complex calculation logic
hackathons.impact: Designed and built a calculator web application that stood out for its creativity and target user-centered experience,

volunteering.responsibilities: Guided a junior team (ages 13-15)  in developing a mobile app using MIT App Inventor, addressing UN SDG 7. Fostered teamwork, problem-solving, and technical skills in a safe and inclusive bootcamp environment.
volunteering.impact: Successfully led the team to complete their project for the regional competition, fostering interest in STEM fields and empowering young women in technology.

volunteering.responsibilities: Organized and hosted in-person English language learning events and workshops, growing the local Duolingo community and fostering a vibrant learning environment.
volunteering.impact: Enhanced language proficiency for numerous participants in the Coquimbo region through community building and engagement.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: From concept to code: my latest works

posts.title: Insights & Reflections
posts.subtitle: Dive into my latest posts and discover reflections on web development trends, personal growth, and the ever-evolving digital landscape.

connect.title: Let’s Connect!
connect.ctaMeeting: Your next project could start with a simple conversation. Book a chat directly on my calendar!
connect.ctaMedia: Find me on LinkedIn, GitHub, and Bluesky to stay in touch.
